review: ahhhh...! one of my all time favorite movies! the plot line is just so hilarious and cute. priyanka has done a fabulous job, along john and abhishek. few songs are beautiful as well. but totally worth the watch!

both abhishek bachan and john abraham share an excellent chemistry and their friendship shows hilariously beautiful on screen. its essentially a story on friendship thats created based on a lie but its extremely entertaining. this movie came out a while ago but you can never get enough of its comedy.
it's a great movie, i really loved it! probably would be watching once in awhile cause it's so funny and entertaining. worth the time.
